title: KathTrend Bigelow 7/1: Trisha's Phone, COVID, Bobby Bonilla Day, Yellowstone, NBA, Airpocalypse
itunes:title: KathTrend Bigelow 7/1: Trisha's Phone, COVID, Bobby Bonilla Day, Yellowstone, NBA, Airpocalypse
description:
In this edition of KathTrend Bigelow, Jack and super producer Trisha discuss Trisha dropping her phone, COVID being "easier to get, harder to avoid", Bobby Bonilla Day, more flooding in Yellowstone, NBA news, and the Airpocalypse!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
